translation.en: [teenage girl] "It began as a prank and ended in murder."
Thank you for shopping at B. Dalton's.
The Shadyside Mall is now closed.
The Shadyside Mall is now closed.
Hello, this is B. Dalton's. We're closed.
OK, since when do you work late?
Since my mom used her last paycheck on scratch tickets instead of the gas bill.
translation.ko: 엄마가 월급을 복권에 탕진해서 가스비를 못 내게 생겼거든

translation.en: I do need a ride tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 나 좀 태워다 주면 좋겠는데

translation.en: And, yes, I don't want to walk home alone.
Fine. Just give me and, uh… Jasmine here 15 minutes to close up.
Yeah, I thought, uh… "Big Tits" was kind of deflating her ego.
Hi, um… I'm in the Shadyside Mall.
Ma'am, if you don't answer, I'm gonna dispatch help.
while Sunnyvale enters its 30th year with no violent crime.
translation.ko: 한편 서니베일은 지난 30년간 폭력 범죄가 전무했죠

translation.en: [female reporter 2] Killer Capital, USA, as tragedy struck again.
translation.ko: "구드 보안관 서니베일 안전 확신" 미 살인마 수도에 또다시 비극이 덮쳤습니다

translation.en: [male sports announcer] Sunnyvale football wins again!
[female reporter 3] Christina Marlow and Jessica Van were found in a house in a residential area near Shadyside.
translation.ko: 크리스티나 말로와 제시카 밴이 셰이디사이드 부근에서 발견돼

translation.en: [man 1] Shadysiders seem to have no desire to better themselves.
More body parts found in the lake between Shadyside and Sunnyvale.
translation.ko: 두 지역 사이 호수에서 신체 일부가 또 발견됐습니다

translation.en: [male announcer 1] Sunnyvale voted Most Beautiful Place to Live!
translation.ko: 가장 살기 좋은 곳으로 서니베일이 선정됐습니다!

translation.en: [male reporter 2] Shadyside residents are spending another night hunkering down in darkness as…
translation.ko: 셰이디사이드 사람들은 또다시 마음 졸이며 어둠 속에서…

translation.en: [male announcer 2] Find your new home in Sunnyvale,
where the sun always shines, even when it's cloudy!
While the depression hit Shadyside hard,
the economy in Sunnyvale continues to shine.
[female reporter 4] According to sources with the Shadyside Police…
♪ I'm only happy when it rains ♪
♪ You know I love it When the news is bad ♪ ♪ Why it feels so good to feel so sad? ♪
But among locals, a history of horror has earned it another nickname,
translation.ko: 비극적 역사로 인해 별명을 얻게 됐습니다

translation.en: -And last night, tragedy struck again. -Ugh, Dad!
I'm here with Sheriff Nick Goode. Sheriff, what can you tell us?
translation.ko: 닉 구드 보안관과 만났습니다 보안관님, 상황이 어떤가요?

translation.en: [female reporter] Shadyside sits just beside Sunnyvale,
one of the safest and wealthiest communities in the country…
What is it about Shadyside? How do we end this cycle of violence?
translation.ko: 셰이디사이드의 계속되는 비극을 어떻게 멈출 수 있을까요?

translation.en: -♪ I am a man who walks alone… ♪ -[keyboard clicking] ♪ And when I'm walking a dark road ♪
♪ At night Or strolling through the park… ♪
♪ When the light begins to change ♪
translation.ko: "살인범이 해골 가면 썼던데!" "네, 뉴스 봤어요 미치광이가 또 나왔죠"

translation.en: ♪ I sometimes feel a little strange ♪ ♪ A little anxious when it's dark ♪
-Dude! What the hell? -This isn't yours, dillweed!
translation.ko: - 뭐야, 왜 이래? - 이거 임자 있어, 멍청아

translation.en: Oh, I get it. You building a shrine or something?
Alright, you know what? It's time for school. Get in the car.
Dad said you weren't allowed on this. Know how expensive AOL is?
translation.ko: 아빠가 이거 쓰지 말랬잖아 인터넷 요금 비싸단 말이야

translation.en: I'm stealing it. I'm talking to someone!
translation.ko: 훔쳐 쓰는 거야 나 얘기 중이라고!

translation.en: This internet bullshit is exactly why you have no friends.
translation.ko: 그런 인터넷 헛소리에 빠져 있으니 친구가 없지

translation.en: It's not bullshit. It's a community dedicated to the truth.
translation.ko: 헛소리 아니야 우리는 사실만 갖고 얘기해

translation.en: Look, some guy went crazy and killed a bunch of people at the mall last night.
translation.ko: 봐, 어젯밤 쇼핑몰에서 누군가 미쳐서 사람들을 죽였어

translation.en: [Josh] It was all over the news.
translation.ko: 뉴스에 쫙 깔렸어 "사건 기록부 셰이디사이드 쇼핑몰 사건"

translation.en: But, of course, the media won't talk about the most important part.
translation.ko: 하지만 언론 기사에는 중요한 부분이 다 빠져 있지

translation.en: [Deena] Josh, I am telling you calmly,
step out of your internet fantasy nerd land and get in the car.
translation.ko: 인터넷 괴짜 세상에서 나와서 차에 타

translation.en: Step out your depressoid "I'm gonna die alone" land, and stop obsessing about Sam!
translation.ko: 누나나 외톨이 세상에서 나와! 샘한테 그만 집착하고

translation.en: Up, up, down, down. Left, right, left, right, B, A, start.
translation.ko: 위 위 아래 아래 좌 우 좌 우 B A 시작

translation.en: You see? It's the witch. Sarah Fier's back.
translation.ko: 봤지? 마녀 짓이야 세라 피어가 돌아왔어

translation.en: "She reaches from beyond the grave to make good men her wicked slaves!"
translation.ko: '무덤 속 마녀가 선한 자들을 사악한 노예로 만드네!'

translation.en: "She'll take your head. She'll follow you until you're dead!"
translation.ko: '네 머리를 취하지 널 따라다녀, 죽을 때까지!'

translation.en: What? The dude was wearing a Halloween skull mask!
The dude was probably just some sad sack who hated his life, like the rest of us,
translation.ko: 살인범도 우리랑 마찬가지로 힘든 인생 때문에 슬퍼하다가

translation.en: except he decided, "Hey, why don't I get out of here for good?"
And, "Hey, why don't I take Heather and a couple other mall rats with me?"
translation.ko: '헤더와 쇼핑몰 놈들 몇 명도 데려가지, 뭐'

translation.en: There's no angry dead witch who made him go postal.
translation.ko: 죽은 마녀가 분풀이로 미치게 한 게 아니라

translation.en: The only thing that made him go crazy is this town!
Seems like… maybe you got a little witch in you.
Dude, why are you even in here? This is the girls' bathroom.
translation.ko: 넌 여기서 뭐 해? 여자 화장실이잖아

translation.en: You know we don't believe this witch shit, right?
It's just, like, fucked-up Santa Claus or something.
-What's this? -I need you to give this to Sam tonight.
translation.ko: - 이게 뭐야? - 이따 밤에 샘한테 전해줘

translation.en: I am not getting mixed up in your ex drama. Do it yourself.
translation.ko: 둘 사이에 나 끌어들이지 말고 네가 직접 전해

translation.en: I'm not going to the game. I quit band.
translation.ko: 난 경기 안 가, 밴드 그만뒀어

translation.en: Was band the only extracurricular you had left?
You still have your band uniform, right?
You just wear that shit one last time.
I've got something that'll give you the balls to face Sam.
translation.ko: 샘과 대면할 용기가 필요하면 나한테 말해

translation.en: What? You're dealing again? I thought you stopped after this dingus's brother OD'd.
translation.ko: 또 약 거래해? 사이먼 가족 그렇게 되고 그만뒀나 했더니

translation.en: Wh… Uh… Timmy wasn't a real OD.
Which one of us is valedictorian, again?
President of every club this shithole has to offer.
translation.ko: 이 똥통 학교에 있는 모든 클럽의 대표는?

translation.en: I'm getting out of here. Off to claim my place among the stars, bitch.
translation.ko: 나 이 동네 뜰 거야 앞으로 크게 되실 몸이란다

translation.en: [boy] Woo! The witch lives! Long live Sarah Fier!
translation.ko: 마녀는 살아 있어! 세라 피어 만세!

translation.en: out of respect for last night's tragic events,
translation.ko: 어제 있었던 비극적 사건을 추모하는 의미에서

translation.en: Sunnyvale will host a candlelight vigil for the victims.
translation.ko: 희생자를 기리는 촛불 집회가 서니베일에서 열린다

translation.en: All player, cheer and band attendance is mandatory.
translation.ko: 선수와 치어리더, 밴드 멤버는 무조건 참여해

translation.en: ♪ I don't care if it hurts… ♪ [music fades]
[man 1 over speakers] This isn't how I wanted to be here tonight.
translation.ko: 전 오늘 이 자리에 다른 이유로 서고 싶었습니다

translation.en: I wanted to be here as a fan.
Our Sunnyvale Devils and your Shadyside Witches
throwing down some good old American football.
translation.ko: 미식축구 경기를 펼치는 모습을 보면서 말입니다

translation.en: as a husband, a father, as a neighbor. And, yes,
And on behalf of all of the people in my town,
I say all of Sunnyvale mourns with you.
Yeah, really looks like they give a damn.
The only Sunnyvalers who came were the ones who had to.
translation.ko: 여기 있는 서니베일 사람들은 다 어쩔 수 없이 온 거야

translation.en: The football team and the cheerleaders.
[mayor] Our hearts are broken with grief.
I didn't think you were coming.
[man 2 over speakers] My family's been in Sunnyvale for generations,
translation.ko: 저희 집안은 수 세대에 걸쳐 서니베일에 살았죠

translation.en: and now my brother is mayor and I your sheriff.
translation.ko: 이제 제 동생은 이곳의 시장 저는 보안관이 되었습니다

translation.en: And yet, I've seen you, our neighbors in Shadyside,
It's easy in times like this to drown in questions of why…
translation.ko: 이런 상황에서 흔히들 던지는 질문이 있죠

translation.en: there are no answers that will provide relief.
translation.ko: 어떤 대답도 위안이 될 순 없죠

translation.en: There's no peace found in the past.
You broke up with me! Remember? So stop acting like I'm the bad guy.
translation.ko: 헤어지자고 한 건 너잖아 왜 내가 잘못한 것처럼 굴어?

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm not the one who moved to Sunnyvale.
OK, you made the choice. I just made it official.
translation.ko: 결정은 네가 했어 내가 대신 말한 거지

translation.en: You just couldn't wait to start your new fake life with your fake-ass mom!
translation.ko: 넌 그냥 가식덩어리 엄마랑 새 출발 하고 싶었던 거잖아!

translation.en: I am half an hour away.
It might as well be the goddamn moon, and you know it.
I know you were always too afraid to tell anyone about us.
translation.ko: 네가 우리 사이 얘기하는 거 늘 꺼렸던 거 알아

translation.en: And I know that douchebag out there was squeezing your ass.
translation.ko: 아까 그 얼간이 새끼가 네 엉덩이 주무른 것도 알고

translation.en: -You broke up with me. -What's his name?
translation.ko: - 헤어지자고 한 건 너야 - 걘 이름이 뭐냐?

translation.en: -You broke up with me! -What's his name, Sam?
We must not fall into darkness.
We must look to the light.
[scoffs] Yeah! What we should do is light a fuse
-You don't get it! -[Deena] No, no. I do.
translation.ko: - 넌 이해 못 해 - 못 하긴

translation.en: There's not much of a future in Shadyside with a lesbo.
Dead on the mall floor after a double shift,
or maybe, maybe if you're really lucky, you're the one carrying the knife.
translation.ko: 운이 정말 좋다면 칼 든 쪽이 되겠지

translation.en: I said it ain't a tragedy when it happens every week.
-"Welcome to the suck!" "Shit is doomed!" -Shit is doomed!
-It's like you want to lose. -At least I know who I am.
translation.ko: - 실패하려고 작정했어? - 적어도 난 주제 파악은 해

translation.en: Stop being mad at me for wanting a different future.
translation.ko: 더 나은 인생 찾아간다고 나한테 화내지 마

translation.en: It's not your future if you're pretending to be someone else.
translation.ko: 더 나은 인생이 아니라 가짜 인생이지

translation.en: You little green prick! Come here, you little bitch! Come here!
translation.ko: 이 초록 등신이! 이리 와, 새끼야!

translation.en: -They think they can do what they want! -[all] No!
translation.ko: - 뭐든 자기들 맘대로 하지 - 안 돼!

translation.en: [Kate] They ruin our vigil, then go waltzing back to their mansions,
translation.ko: 우리 집회를 망쳐놓고 유유히 집으로들 돌아가겠지

translation.en: like we're some reject pile that they can step on!
Well, we are not the reject pile!
We're gonna go kill those preppy assholes!
[shouting] When I say Shady, you say side!
When I say Shady, you say side!
[Simon] When I say Shady, you say side!
-You gotta be kidding me. -Hey, isn't that, uh…
[boy] Where are you going, you pussies?
-[Sam] Peter, stop! What are you doing? -[Peter] Chill out!
This is definitely a good idea, right? Deena?
[Peter] Sam! What… what are you doing?
Stay away from her, you bull dyke freak!
[Kate] OK, we should not be down here.
-Shut up, help me carry her! -We need to leave, like ten minutes ago.
translation.ko: - 닥치고 같이 부축해 - 여기 있으면 안 된다고!

translation.en: -We have to clear her airway. -Quit it!
Hey! I got this. Chill out.
-How many fingers am I holding up? -Three.
translation.ko: 손가락이 몇 개 보여? 세 개
디나 존슨이지? 네, E 두 개요

translation.en: Well, it was driving behind the bus. Does that count as pursuing?
translation.ko: 버스 뒤에 오고 있었죠 그것도 쫓는 건가요?

translation.en: The driver said that before the crash someone opened the emergency exit.
translation.ko: 운전자 말로는 사고 직전에 버스 비상문이 열렸다던데

translation.en: He also saw you with the cooler.
translation.ko: 네가 냉장 박스 든 것도 봤대

translation.en: Maybe you were just, um… goofing around.
translation.ko: 아마 넌 그냥 장난만 치려고 한 건데

translation.en: -Why don't you tell me what happened? -[Deena] I don't know.

translation.ko: 원래 사고라는 게 예상할 수 없잖아요

translation.en: Well, if you do think of anything,
Well, Daddy will buy you a new one.
Do it before Dad gets here, he's gonna murder you!
translation.ko: 아빠 오기 전에 죽이시지 아빠가 누나 죽이기 전에!

translation.en: You know the cops called him at work about some accident last night?
translation.ko: 경찰이 아빠 직장에 전화해서 무슨 사고 얘기 했다는데?

translation.en: Please get out of my room. You get out of your room. You've been in your bed all day!
translation.ko: - 내 방에서 나가 - 누나야말로 침대에서 나와

translation.en: [female reporter] I'm here with Martin P. Franklin, Shadyside Mall Janitor.
translation.ko: 셰이디사이드 쇼핑몰 관리인 마틴 프랭클린과 만났습니다

translation.en: -Martin, what do you know? -[Martin] He was a normal dude.
translation.ko: - 마틴, 어떻게 된 거죠? - 평범한 친구였어요

translation.en: Always thought he would, like, just go home and read a comic book or whatever.
translation.ko: 퇴근하면 집에 가서 만화책 볼 것 같은 타입이죠

translation.en: He was chill, just snapped I guess.
as mall employee Ryan Torres has been identified as the killer.
translation.ko: 쇼핑몰 직원 라이언 토레스가 살인범으로 밝혀졌습니다

translation.en: A recent graduate of Shadyside High
an ordinary guy who, as those who knew him attest,
translation.ko: 평범한 사람이었지만 갑자기 이상해진 것 같다고

translation.en: Hi. Uh, Samantha Fraser's room, please?
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 서맨사 프레이저 병실로 연결해 주실래요?

translation.en: -[woman] Hello? -[Deena] Uh… Hi, uh, Mrs. Fraser.
-I wanted to see how she was doing. -[Ms. Fraser] Deena?
I was just w… worried about her and--
[Ms. Fraser] You won't stop until you've ruined her life completely, will you?
translation.ko: 얘 인생을 얼마나 더 망쳐야 속이 시원하겠니?

translation.en: -She's fine. Don't call here again. -[line goes dead]
See you got the full costume now!
If you finish in an hour, I'll let you watch My So-Called Life with me.
translation.ko: 1시간 내로 끝내면 나랑 같이 드라마 볼 수 있어

translation.en: And, uh, do not eat these.
These will make your little hearts stop, you'll choke to death on vomit
translation.ko: 먹으면 심장이 멈추고 토하다 질식해 죽어

translation.en: and everyone will be so, so super sad.
[man 1] Bob, easy with that blood. It's our last can!
translation.ko: 밥, 피 아껴서 뿌려 그게 마지막이야

translation.en: Lights and darks, and watch for stray socks.
translation.ko: 밝은색과 어두운색으로 나눠 양말 짝 맞나 보고

translation.en: -Remind me what's in it for me again? -Nope.
translation.ko: - 이거 하면 뭐 해준다고? - 그냥 해

translation.en: You still wearing the clothes from last night?
Did you wear that to the grocery store?
I had to work a double shift and this was all I had in the car.
translation.ko: 나 2교대 연속 일했고 차에 있는 게 이거뿐이었어
나 2교대 연속 일했고 차에 있는 게 이거뿐이었어 그래서 입었다

translation.en: -[man 1 on TV] Alright, kiddo? -[man 2] There I was at ten…
That prick Peter is screwing with me.
Yeah, he's creeping around our house in one of those skull masks. It's fucked.
translation.ko: 해골 가면 쓰고 집 주변을 돌아다녀, 미쳤지

translation.en: [sighs] I gotta go. Call you back.
What? Make up your mind, woman!
-[whispering] Maybe this isn't a good id-- -Shh!
-[quietly] Are you crazy? -[Kate] It's just that Sunnyvale asshole.
Oh, no. I'm so happy to have the company.
-[Kate] You're a lifesaver, Mrs. Lane. -[Mrs. Lane] I used to be a nurse.
translation.ko: - 제 은인이세요, 레인 씨 - 전에 간호사였거든

translation.en: Are you… you sure everything's OK?
Totally! I just have to run out and…

translation.ko: - 그 변태 놈 죽인다! - 왜 집에 들어갔지?

translation.en: Why would he break in there? I just don't understand what he was doing.
translation.ko: - 그 변태 놈 죽인다! - 왜 집에 들어갔지? - 뭘 하러 들어간 거냐고 - 행동이 겁나 이상했어

translation.en: He was acting all shifty and shit.
translation.ko: - 뭘 하러 들어간 거냐고 - 행동이 겁나 이상했어

translation.en: You need to get some groceries, man.
translation.ko: 마트 가서 장도 좀 보고 그래

translation.en: -We have an incredible sale at the store-- -He broke into the house! He had a knife!
translation.ko: 지금 할인을 엄청 하는데… 집에 칼을 들고 들어왔어!

translation.en: Whoa! With the kids there? That's wack!
There were kids there. OK, and what?
He thinks because he's balling Sam,
he can come and prank us on our own turf.
Hey, you know what? You're right. Fuck this.
translation.ko: 네 말이 맞아, 씨발, 가만 안 둬

translation.en: Don't forget the most important part. Fuck Sam.
translation.ko: 더 중요한 게 있잖아 샘을 조져야지

translation.en: Yeah, fuck her. She needs to get her psycho boyfriend in check.
translation.ko: 그래, 맞아 사이코 애인 단속도 못 하고

translation.en: -Fill these out and take a seat. -No, I'm just visiting.
translation.ko: - 이거 작성하고 앉아있어요 - 방문 온 건데요

translation.en: [clears throat] Tell Nurse Beddy she has a patient.
Beddy. Long time, how you been?
-Still toting around with this moron. -She can't quit me, Beddy. Too pretty!
translation.ko: 아직 이 새끼 달고 다니네 이 이쁜이는 못 끊죠

translation.en: I'm sure that you do, but there happens to be a new security protocol.
translation.ko: 그렇겠지, 그나저나 여기 보안 프로토콜이 바뀌어서

translation.en: We kept coming up short on blueberries and bananas.
-So now I need a special key-- -I need to see a patient.
translation.ko: - 특수 열쇠가 필요한… - 봐야 할 환자가 있어요

translation.en: You want anything from the machine? I'm starving.
translation.ko: 자판기에서 뽑을 거 없어? 배고파 죽겠다

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -What do you think?
-What game? What are you talking about? -[Deena] About your dipshit boyfriend.
translation.ko: - 뭔 장난? 무슨 소리야? - 네 얼간이 남자친구

translation.en: -He threatened, "You're all fucking dead." -That didn't mean anything.
translation.ko: 어제 우리 다 죽이겠다고 협박했잖아 그냥 한 말이야

translation.en: Now tonight, he's stalking around, messing with us.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에 얼쩡대면서 우리를 괴롭히고 있어

translation.en: He broke into the house where Kate was babysitting.
translation.ko: 케이트가 애들 보고 있던 집에까지 들어왔다고

translation.en: You need to call him and tell him to back off.
Good news. They're gonna transfer you out of this shithole tomorrow.
translation.ko: 잘됐다, 이 똥통에서 내일 내보내 준대

translation.en: Don't look at me, dude. I'm… I'm… I'm broke.
[Sam] He has been with me all night!
-Stop covering for him! He's a bad guy. -You're out of control!
translation.ko: - 자꾸 저 자식 감싸주지 마 - 너 제정신 아니구나

translation.en: You put me in the hospital! Now you're here yelling at me--
translation.ko: 병원 신세 지게 하더니 이젠 나한테 소리까지 지르고…

translation.en: OK. No, that was an accident. Look, I got a nosebleed.
-I didn't actually mean-- -A nosebleed? Stop making excuses!
So don't blame me when you wake up in ten years just like your dad!
translation.ko: 10년 뒤 너희 아빠처럼 돼도 나 원망하지 마

translation.en: Old and drunk and going nowhere!
translation.ko: 나이 들고 술 취해서 실패자로 살겠지!

translation.en: Second, yeah. Congrats on getting out of Shadyside, Sam.
All you had to do was suck it up, literally, and swallow some Sunnyvale--
translation.ko: 그러려고 서니베일 놈한테 살살 아양 떨면서…

translation.en: You know what? I never want to see you again!
translation.ko: 됐어 다신 내 앞에 나타나지 마

translation.en: Great. Have a nice goddamn life!
translation.ko: 그래, 존나 잘 먹고 잘 살아라

translation.en: -Where'd you learn how to do this? -Oh, a lot of people trade hacks online.
translation.ko: 이런 건 어디서 배웠어? 인터넷에서 이런 방법 많이 거래해

translation.en: …when'd you get into the fruit business?
Oh, that's just temporary. Saving up to get out of here.
translation.ko: 잠깐만 하는 거야 돈 모아서 이 동네 뜨려고

translation.en: -Where are the keys? Do you have the keys? -No!
translation.ko: - 차 키 어딨어? 차 키? - 없어

translation.en: -[Deena whispers] No! -You can't wear that mask. What are--
translation.ko: - 안 돼요, 안 돼! - 그 가면은 뭐예요? 무슨…

translation.en: -[Simon] Come on! Let's go! -[Josh] Come on!
[female reporter] Mall employee Ryan Torres has been identified
as the killer in the mall massacre.
-[Simon] Deena! Hurry up! Let's go! -[Deena] Go! Go!
-[Simon] We have to go now! -[Deena] Hurry!
[Nick] You have access to the mall. You are still employed there, correct?
I'mma tell you again. Somebody planted that.
Why would I tag my own place of work? Come on, man!
Martin, around here, people show a little respect. They call me Sheriff Goode.
translation.ko: 마틴, 예의 있는 사람들은 날 구드 보안관이라고 불러

translation.en: [Deena] I'm telling you, it was him!
The psycho killer my colleague shot dead, huh?
translation.ko: 내 동료가 쏴 죽인 그 사이코 살인범?

translation.en: Yes! That's what we keep saying!
You told me to come to you.
We should not be this close to the police station in a stolen ambulance.
translation.ko: 훔친 구급차 갖고 경찰서 옆에 있자고?
뻔한 곳에 숨는 게 오히려 안전해

translation.en: Ted Bundy, when he was stalking his victims, I mean.
translation.ko: 테드 번디가 여자들을 염탐할 때 그랬다고

translation.en: OK, didn't he get caught though?
-Well, no. Well, yeah, but-- -Figure this out. I'm gonna take a leak.
translation.ko: 아니 - 잡히긴 했는데… - 얘기해, 오줌 누러 간다

translation.en: -[Josh sighs] -Why do you know so much about killers?
-You hang onto any of that candy? -[Josh] Yeah.
Yeah. Yeah, the mall killer, Ryan Torres.
I know, but you guys must have made a mistake or something. Look…
translation.ko: 아마 경찰 측에서 뭔가 실수가 있었다거나…

translation.en: Let me get the right paperwork.
Would you say he was more, uh, Dawn of the Dead
translation.ko: 어느 쪽에 가까웠니? '새벽의 저주'? '살아있는 시체들의 밤'?

translation.en: or Night of the Living Dead?
-You don't believe us? -This was a waste of time.
We've had prank calls, we've had reports of skeleton mask copycats all weekend.
translation.ko: 주말 내내 장난 전화에 해골 가면 모방범에 시달렸어

translation.en: Got a call from the hospital. Lady sounded worked up.
translation.ko: 병원에서 전화 왔는데 많이 놀란 목소리야

translation.en: Uh… wait, I'll… I got it. Take care of them.
translation.ko: 잠깐만, 내가 처리할게요 얘들 좀 부탁해요

translation.en: [girl singing] ♪ You always hurt the one you love ♪
♪ The one you shouldn't hurt at all ♪
translation.ko: 절대 상처 주면 안 되는 사람

translation.en: This is bullshit. There are bodies at the hospital. You're gonna see--
Honey, we are so appreciative of this tip.
-The killer is still out there! -We'll do our damnedest to catch him.
translation.ko: - 살인마가 돌아다닌다고요! - 최선을 다해 잡아 보마

translation.en: You're a monster! You're supposed to protect us!
translation.ko: 나쁜 놈! 우릴 보호할 생각은 안 하고!

translation.en: Hey, hey! Young lady, do not test me!
[panting] I'm so sorry, sir. I have no idea what came over me.
translation.ko: 정말 죄송해요 제가 잠깐 어떻게 됐었나 봐요

translation.en: Go find your boyfriends! Tell them you need to relax!
Do… do you need help? What the…

translation.ko: 디나, 천천히 좀 가, 왜 이래?

translation.en: -[Sam] What are you doing? -[Deena] Just walk, fast.
translation.ko: 디나, 천천히 좀 가, 왜 이래? 빨리 걷기나 해

translation.en: I think we should stay. We're safe here. What if that psycho shows up again?
translation.ko: 여기 있자, 안전하잖아 그 미친놈이 또 오면 어떡해?

translation.en: -Then we'll be ready. -[Sam] What the hell?
Is that the cop's? You stole a cop's gun?
translation.ko: 경찰 거야? 경찰 총 훔친 거냐고

translation.en: -You out of your goddamn mind? -They didn't believe us.
-[Kate] Come on! -[Simon] Go! Go! Let's go!
[Sam] It doesn't make sense. It's… it's not possible.
-Who the hell was that? -How the hell should I know? She…
She was hot! I don't know! The bitch seemed normal!
translation.ko: 예뻐서 말 건 거야 평범해 보였다고!

translation.en: I hate to break it to you, but normal bitches don't bleed black fucking blood!
translation.ko: 참고로, 평범한 여자면 피가 시꺼멓지 않겠지!

translation.en: Well, she was hot and normal until she attacked me with a fucking razor blade!
translation.ko: 평범한 예쁜 여자였는데 갑자기 면도칼 들고 덤비잖아!

translation.en: Yeah, for like old-timey shaving, or in this case, I guess, slitting her--
translation.ko: 그래, 옛날에 면도할 때 쓰던 건데, 그걸로…

translation.en: Was she singing a song, like an oldie… like an oldie song?
Jesus, Rain Man. How the fuck do you know that?
translation.ko: 세상에 넌 그런 걸 대체 어떻게 아냐?

translation.en: -[Josh] The girl who attacked you. -[Simon] Holy shit!
translation.ko: - 널 공격한 여자애 - 말도 안 돼!

translation.en: She sang as she murdered her boyfriend,
her friends, then she killed herself. Slashed her wrists.
Jesus. Yeah, why didn't I see this on the news?
translation.ko: 미친, 이런 사건을 왜 뉴스에서 못 봤지?

translation.en: Ruby is one of Shadyside's killers, just like Skull Mask.
translation.ko: 루비는 여기 출신 살인마야 해골 가면처럼

translation.en: -[Josh] "Masked psycho murders kids at--" -[Kate] Camp Nightwing.
Yeah, my mom's sister was there.
That screwed my family up for a long time.
translation.ko: 그 일로 우리 가족이 풍비박산 났지

translation.en: local milkman slashes a bunch of housewives.
translation.ko: 동네 우유 배달부였는데 주부들을 연달아 살해했어

translation.en: 1904, Grifter guts girls, and on and on.
It happens in Shadyside over and over. Normal people turn into psychos.
translation.ko: 셰이디사이드에서 계속 이렇게 평범한 사람들이 미치광이가 돼

translation.en: 1666. He was the first one recorded.
He, um… killed kids and cut out their eyes.
-I always liked this sweater. -Yeah, I know.
If you get blood on it, I'll kill you.
There are people trying to kill us.
Dead people, if you believe my weirdo brother.
translation.ko: 내 괴짜 동생 말이 맞는다면 죽은 사람들이고

translation.en: Look, I know I always give you shit for pretending you're someone you're not,
translation.ko: 내가 너 가짜 인생 산다고 지랄깨나 했지만

translation.en: It's not really easy for me to…
you know, be like us… either.
-Are you giving me a pass? -[chuckles] No.
Fine. I'm not gonna say what I was gonna say.
translation.ko: 알았어 할 말 있었는데 안 해야겠네

translation.en: I mean, here we are. We're together for one night and--
translation.ko: 지금 우릴 봐 고작 하룻밤 같이 있었는데

translation.en: Dead people are trying to kill us.

translation.ko: 이 여자가 여기 사람들을 살인마로 만들고 있어

translation.en: No one actually thinks that this witch shit is real.
translation.ko: 이 마녀 얘기를 누가 진짜로 믿어

translation.en: Yeah, it's something babysitters make up to scare kids.
translation.ko: 유모들이 애들 겁주려고 만들어 낸 얘기 아니야?

translation.en: No, no. Just listen to me.
1666, Sarah Fier was hanged for witchcraft, fact.
But ever since she was executed, she's been possessing people,
translation.ko: 그 이후로 세라 피어는 사람들 몸에 들어가서

translation.en: turning them into killers, to take revenge on the town.
translation.ko: 살인마로 만들면서 이 마을에 복수를 한 거고

translation.en: -[Simon] It's like the nursery rhyme. -[Josh] Yeah. Yeah.
translation.ko: 살인마로 만들면서 이 마을에 복수를 한 거고 - 그 동요 가사잖아 - 맞아

translation.en: [Simon] "Before the witch's final breath, she found a way to cheat her death."
translation.ko: '마녀는 마지막 순간에 죽음을 피할 방법을 찾았네'

translation.en: "By cutting off her cursed hand, she kept her grip upon our land."
to make good men her wicked slaves."
Don't you see what's happening to us? This is all proof.
translation.ko: 이래도 못 믿겠어? 이게 다 증거야

translation.en: Shadyside isn't just some hotbed for psychos.
All these massacres are connected to Sarah Fier. The witch's curse is real!
translation.ko: 전부 세라 피어와 연관이 있어 마녀의 저주는 진짜야!

translation.en: Fine. Let's assume that the witch has been possessing people
for some sort of messed-up vendetta.
This isn't the same as the mall massacre. Something different is happening to us.
translation.ko: 지금 이건 쇼핑몰 학살과 달라 완전히 다른 상황이라고

translation.en: OK, we have two of her killers after us and both of them are dead.
translation.ko: 이미 죽은 살인마 두 명이 우리를 쫓고 있잖아

translation.en: Why is she so mad at us?
I don't know, you know. I thought I hit my head…
translation.ko: 잘 모르겠지만 머리를 부딪친 줄 알았는데

translation.en: I can't believe you're wearing that.
Can't believe you're above it, when we're in the middle of the fucking woods and dead maniacs are after us.
translation.ko: 안 쓰는 네가 이상하지 숲속에서 살인마들에게 쫓기는데

translation.en: OK, so I fell out of the car…
This is bad! This is really bad!
No wonder the witch is pissed at us. I'd be pissed too.
[sighs] Now she's sending her henchmen after us.
translation.ko: 그래서 하수인들을 보내 우릴 쫓는 거야

translation.en: As in every one of those sickos on your wall is coming after us?
translation.ko: 아까 본 미친 살인마들이 죄다 우릴 쫓는 거야?

translation.en: [Simon] Hold up. Hold up. She's mad because we disturbed her grave, right?
translation.ko: 잠깐만, 무덤을 건드려서 마녀가 화난 거랬지?

translation.en: Just put the bones back, rebury them, and put her to rest!
translation.ko: 유골을 원위치에 다시 놓고 잘 묻어주자고!

translation.en: Whatever. Let's do it quickly so we can go.
Deena, Deena! Find something to wrap her bones!
translation.ko: - 좋았어 - 디나! 유골 감쌀 것 줘

translation.en: I think there's someone in the woods!
-That was the Camp Nightwing Killer! -That was a bust!
Yeah, maybe because it's not like the movies, OK?
It's not as easy as putting bones to rest!
-It should've worked. It always works! -[Josh] Maybe it's her missing hand.
translation.ko: - 왜 이게 안 먹히지? - 손 하나가 없어서 그런가?

translation.en: Who gives a shit? It doesn't matter. Hey, how do I not die?
translation.ko: 알 게 뭐야 내가 살 방법이 뭐야?

translation.en: [Simon] We! How do we not die! And I'm looking at you, witch nerd!
translation.ko: 우리 다 같이 살아야지! 말해봐, 마녀 전문가!

translation.en: -I… I don't know! -They're not coming for us!
-I saw her again… -[woman whispers] It's you.
The witch. She… I disturbed her grave.
Yeah. Yeah, yeah. Nightwing ran right by me.
translation.ko: 맞아, 나이트윙 살인마도 날 지나쳐 갔어

translation.en: I jumped out his way, it was like he didn't even see me. He went for her.
Skull Mask came after us at home. And while you guys were babysitting!
translation.ko: 해골 가면은 우리 집하고 너희 있던 집에 왔었고!

translation.en: Skull Mask didn't care about us.
translation.ko: 해골 가면이 찾던 건 우리가 아냐

translation.en: Yeah! From the crash when Sam puked period!
translation.ko: 그래, 차 사고 났을 때 샘이 나한테 생리 토했지!

translation.en: It's Jaws, dude! A shark smelling blood!
translation.ko: 영화 '죠스'처럼 피 냄새 맡고 온 거야!

translation.en: [panting] Kate's right! When we found Skeletor,
translation.ko: 케이트 말이 맞아! 그 해골 놈 발견했을 때

translation.en: he was all sniffy and weird with my shirt like a perv in a pantie shop!
translation.ko: 팬티 냄새 맡는 변태처럼 내 티셔츠 킁킁대고 있었어!

translation.en: Yeah, but he came to our house too!
[Simon] Sam bled on her bones, now the witch wants more of her blood!
translation.ko: 샘의 피가 마녀 유골에 묻어서 그 피를 찾아다니는 거야!

translation.en: OK, so what do they do in Jaws?
They didn't go skinny-dipping with the goddamn bait. She's not bait!
Seriously, if we're right and they're after her…
let's give these assholes what they want.

translation.ko: 우리 몸에서 흔적을 싹 지워야 해

translation.en: You can't have any of Sam's blood on you.
Well, not much I can do about that.
translation.ko: 난 할 수 있는 게 없네

translation.en: Deena, you have to get clean too! Not a single drop, OK?
translation.ko: 누나도 잘 확인해 피 한 방울도 있으면 안 돼

translation.en: I don't want to go in by myself.
[whispering] Up, up, down, down. Left, right, left, right, B, A, start.
translation.ko: 위 위 아래 아래 좌 우 좌 우 B A 시작

translation.en: fine or not, we s… still need to cover it.
[Kate] Do you really think this is going to work?
And, like, tonight's been the first time
I've felt like myself in… months.
translation.ko: 몇 달 만에 진정한 내가 된 기분이야

translation.en: I forgot what that… what that felt like.
-♪ Wouldn't turn around and break it… ♪ -[Kate] Make sure my back is clean.
-You're gonna have to look at me. -♪ And anyone who's ever played a part ♪
What if tonight's it for us?
Did you… all go to pound town?
translation.ko: 너희 다 한 판씩 한 거야?

translation.en: [Josh] The killers go to the blood.
Smile, you son of a bitch!
Are you sure you want to do this?
See you on the other side.
[Ruby Lane singing] ♪ You always hurt the one you love ♪
♪ The one you shouldn't hurt at all ♪
translation.ko: 절대 상처 주면 안 되는 사람

translation.en: Dude! She's here! I saw her!
She was… She was so sexy, but fucking crazy still!
She was doing it! Following the blood trails!
It's working. Skull Mask freak, three o'clock.
If this doesn't work, I will murder you!
No, no! We are not fucked!
She's fucked. They're coming for her.
translation.ko: 샘이 좆 됐지 쟤 쫓아오는 거잖아

translation.en: If we put Sam in the hall, we end this now.
translation.ko: 샘을 복도로 보내면 이 모든 게 끝나
- 나쁜 년 - 더 나은 방법 있어?

translation.en: A bullet won't stop them, fine.
translation.ko: 총알이 안 통한 건 그렇다 쳐

translation.en: But we just tried to goddamn explode them, and that didn't work!
I mean, that's not exactly what she's saying.
You'd let us all die to protect her. Look at this.
translation.ko: 샘 지키려다 우리 다 죽어 이것 봐

translation.en: I don't want you guys to die for me.
translation.ko: 나 때문에 너희까지 죽으면 안 돼

translation.en: Let me go! Let me… Sam!
[Deena] Let me go. Let me go!

translation.ko: 제발! "캠프 나이트윙 생존자 C. 버먼 '마녀를 봤다'"

translation.en: -[Sam] What… what… what is going on? -[Kate] You're not doing this alone.
translation.ko: - 뭐야, 어떻게 된 거야? - 너 혼자 둘 순 없어

translation.en: [Sam] Camp Nightwing. Summer of '78. Group of campers, brutal massacre.
translation.ko: 캠프 나이트윙, 78년 여름 잔혹한 캠핑장 학살 사건

translation.en: There was one Shadyside survivor, C. Berman.
"The still traumatized girl claims that amidst the carnage she saw the witch."
translation.ko: '충격에 휩싸인 소녀는 당시 마녀를 봤다고 한다'

translation.en: Yeah, just like you. So, if she survived, I'm pretty sure--
translation.ko: 같은 상황이지 그 여자가 살았다면, 분명…

translation.en: There may be a way for me to live too.
[Kate] I got it! C. Berman! 9006 Brennan Way.
-I'm not home right now. -I need some help here!
translation.ko: - 저는 지금 집에 없어요 - 누가 좀 도와줘!

translation.en: -Please leave a message after the beep. -No one's there!
translation.ko: - 삐 소리 후 음성 남기세요 - 아무도 없어!

translation.en: Hello, my name is Deena Johnson. I think you saw the witch.
translation.ko: 저는 디나 존슨이라고 해요 마녀를 봤다고 하셨죠?

translation.en: This shit is not gonna hold!
We need to know how you survived!
Hey! We're being attacked, alright? There are killers here!
translation.ko: 우리 지금 공격받고 있어요 살인마들이 왔다고요!

translation.en: If you're there, please pick up! Please answer!
-To record a new message, press one. -Fuck! No!
translation.ko: 음성을 다시 남기려면 1번을… 씨발, 안 돼!

translation.en: What? No, she's alive. That's the whole point.
translation.ko: 뭐? 아니, 살아있어 그래서 지금 이러는 건데

translation.en: [Deena] "C. Berman was found in the woods."
"Her heart had stopped but local boy performed CPR."
What if that's how she survived? Her heart stopped.
translation.ko: 이렇게 살아남은 것 같아 심장이 멈췄었잖아

translation.en: What is it? The fucking rhyme. The fucking rhyme!
translation.ko: 뭐더라, 그 동요 그 동요 뭐야!

translation.en: "She'll take your blood, she'll take your head!"
-[pounding continues] -It's just like Kate said. OK?
And then, just like this C. Berman bitch, we bring you back to life.
translation.ko: 그 버먼 년처럼 널 다시 살려낼 거야

translation.en: Fuck it. I'm dying tonight one way or another.
translation.ko: 그러지 뭐 어차피 오늘 밤 죽을 팔자야

translation.en: Let's try to bring me back.
A few months ago, my brother Timothy had an unfortunate experience
translation.ko: 몇 달 전 내 가족 티머시가 안 좋은 경험을 했어

translation.en: in which he ingested too much of a certain substance.
He was dead for two minutes.
You need to take these in order. Pile one takes the edge off.
translation.ko: 반드시 순서대로 먹어야 돼 1차 묶음을 먹으면 몽롱해져

translation.en: You're gonna feel like you're being fucked by a unicorn.
Pile two is gonna bring your core temp way down.
translation.ko: 2차 묶음을 먹으면 체온이 확 떨어질 거야

translation.en: You need to take a five-minute interval between pile two and pile three.
translation.ko: 그리고 3차 묶음을 먹기 전에 5분 동안 기다려

translation.en: That's really important, OK? Pile three brings you down and out,
so take that "take five" or it's all gonna go to shit!
translation.ko: 5분 동안 안 기다리면 다 망하는 거야

translation.en: -How many do we have? -Tons. Like a thousand.
translation.ko: - 이거 몇 개 있어? - 차고 넘쳐

translation.en: This is what brings her back. This is Jesus!
Remember half an hour ago, when you wanted to murder me?
translation.ko: 30분 전만 해도 다들 나 죽이려던 거 기억나?

translation.en: You don't have to do this. You can leave.
Remember when you decided to sacrifice yourself for us?
translation.ko: 네가 우리 살리려고 희생하려던 거 기억나?

translation.en: OK, I got stock room. You take the emergency exit.
translation.ko: 내가 창고 쪽을 볼게 넌 비상구로 가

translation.en: Whoa! No, no, no! Splitting up is not a good idea at all.
translation.ko: 잠깐만, 안 돼! 붙어 있는 게 좋을 텐데

translation.en: But, dude, listen to me. I know that this is all fucked,
She doesn't have time for most people.
She's being nice because we're probably gonna die.

translation.ko: - 그래서? - 그러니까 너도 그걸 보려고 해봐

translation.en: We would not be this far if it weren't for you.
translation.ko: 우린 너 아니었으면 여기까지 오지도 못했어

translation.en: Now we have to keep those psychos away from Sam.
translation.ko: 지금은 이 사이코들이 샘에게 못 가게 해야 돼

translation.en: What if we fuck up and just kill me?
What if you can't bring me back? [sniffles]
My whole future, my whole life in Shadyside.
translation.ko: 셰이디사이드에서 살아갈 내 미래가 뻔히 보였지

translation.en: A night shift, a day shift,
and a million empty beer cans,
But tonight, even though we are in hell,
translation.ko: 그런데 오늘 밤 상황이 거지 같긴 해도

translation.en: I feel like I have another chance with you.
translation.ko: 너와 다시 시작할 수 있다는 희망이 느껴져

translation.en: And I'm not gonna lose you again.
When this is all over, I am gonna take you on a date.
translation.ko: 이게 다 끝나면 너랑 데이트할 거야

translation.en: We're going to eat cheeseburgers and listen to the Pixies,
and make out and have the best night of our goddamn lives.
translation.ko: 사랑을 나누면서 존나 최고의 밤을 즐길 거야

translation.en: But right now, you've got to die.
Now, look at me. Look at me.
I am going to bring you back.
-It's OK. It's OK. -[crying] I'm so sorry.
[Sam] I need to die. I need to die.
[Deena] Do it! Do it! Do it! Come on!
Josh, Josh! Come help me! Get the pens!
translation.ko: 조시! 와서 도와줘! 그 펜 가져와!

translation.en: Help me! Go get the EpiPens!
I don't know. I don't know.
It has to work! It has to.
I will not let you do this.
[grunting] Come on, Sam. Come on. Come on, Sam!
We were picking up Sam's prescription.
And the lights went out. It was pitch black.
We hid until it was over.
[Nick] You had 15 stitches in your shoulder.
Sam, you look like a ghost. Like you just came back from the dead.
translation.ko: 샘, 얼굴이 백지장이다 방금 죽었다 살아난 사람 같아

translation.en: I'll tell you what the facts tell me.
They're to blame for everything. That feels too easy to me.
translation.ko: 모든 게 그 둘의 잘못이야 이상할 정도로 단순하지만

translation.en: But that's the story this department will go with
unless you can help me to see it differently.
translation.ko: 너희가 다른 증언을 하지 않는다면 말이지

translation.en: An underprivileged overachiever with bright prospects.
translation.ko: 유망하고 의욕 넘치는 불우한 가정의 여자애와

translation.en: A guy who's been supporting his family alone since he was 15.
translation.ko: 15살부터 가족 생계를 혼자 책임져 온 남자애가

translation.en: Both succumbing to the quick cash of drugs.
translation.ko: 약으로 한탕 크게 벌려다 비극으로 끝난 거죠

translation.en: [Nick] You came here for my help. I should have listened to you. I'm sorry.
translation.ko: 도와달라고 나에게 왔을 때 네 말 안 들어준 거 미안하다

translation.en: But there's nothing else to say.
Do you want your friends going down for this?
So I'm a bad guy because I'm in here.
translation.ko: 내가 여기 있다고 나쁜 놈 취급이구나

translation.en: Then that makes you a bad guy, too, little man.
A drug-fueled night of violence leaves a trail of bodies.
translation.ko: 약물 관련 범죄로 여러 명이 사망했습니다

translation.en: [female reporter 2] There are three dead at East Union Medical…

translation.ko: 실은… 지난번에 너한테 이걸 주려고 했어

translation.en: I wanted to give you this the other day.
But you don't have to open it right now.
Yeah, it's not a big deal. Just some pizza.
translation.ko: 그래, 이게 뭐 대수라고 그냥 피자야

translation.en: Alright. Listen, asshole. Don't call here--
-[whispering voice echoes] Sam… -[woman] You called me.
Wanted to know how I survived the Camp Nightwing Massacre.
translation.ko: 캠프 나이트윙 학살에서 어떻게 살아났냐고 물었지

translation.en: [C. Berman] Did you touch the bones? Did you see her face?
translation.ko: 유골을 만졌니? 그 여자 얼굴을 봤어?

translation.en: Yeah, but, uh… thanks for your prompt reply.
-[C. Berman] It's not over. -[whispering voice] Sam…
[C. Berman] But you haven't stopped her.
[C. Berman] She'll do whatever it takes.
♪ And gave it to the rich, yeah ♪
♪ And let the martyrs stretch, yeah ♪
translation.ko: "많은 일이 있었어요…" "내 말이, 그거 봤어?" "애들 살인 행각 말이야 병원이랑 마트에서…"

translation.en: ♪ Singing one more time around Might do it ♪
translation.ko: "애들 살인 행각 말이야 병원이랑 마트에서…" "이번엔 세라 피어 짓이 아닌 것 같더라"
"이번엔 세라 피어 짓이 아닌 것 같더라" "약쟁이들 짓이지 케이트와 사이먼"

translation.en: We have to get her back.
I'm going to get you back.
I thought there was a way to end it.
["School's Out" playing] ♪ School's out for summer… ♪
